---
title: Programming Skills Flow Chart
date: 2014-10-02 14:14:04
author: John Vandivier
---



This flow chart represents the way I took to get where I am in programming.

I think this path was very easy and I highly recommend this approach. You can start with no knowledge at all and end up a web or application developer! I think getting to basic web/app developer can occur in as little as a year or two.

I highly recommend <a href=\"http://codecademy.com/\">Codecademy</a> as a starting point. The chart was made with a great tool called <a href=\"draw.io\">draw.io</a>. Click and drag to move around the map, and you can zoom in and out as well.
<p style=\"text-align: center;\"><strong>The Chart</strong></p>
